Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.sceneControllers

Class EditableSchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.sceneControllers.EditableSchoolBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class EditableSchoolBoard extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
a class to represent a schoolboard that supports drag and drop
